title: Relates to the temporary suspension of a repair shop registration or license and the jurisdiction of repair shop appeals; repealer
summary: Relates to the temporary suspension of a repair shop registration or license and the jurisdiction of repair shop appeals.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the temporary suspension of a repair shop registration or license, jurisdiction of repair shop appeals, and to repeal subdivisions 2 and 4 of section 398-f of such law relating thereto
